name: WinCacheGrind
tagline: WinCacheGrind is a viewer for cachegrind.out files generated by xdebug 2
body:
WinCacheGrind is a viewer for cachegrind.out files generated by [xdebug 2](http://xdebug.org/). WinCacheGrind is functionally similar to [KCacheGrind](http://kcachegrind.sourceforge.net/), only it is much simpler and runs on Windows.

### Screenshot

![WinCacheGrind in action](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/proj/wincachegrind/screenshots/24706.jpg)

### Download

[**Download Latest Release (v1.0.0.14)**](https://github.com/ceefour/wincachegrind/releases/latest)

### Authors and Contributors
1. [Hendy Irawan](http://www.hendyirawan.com/) (@ceefour)
2. [Merijn Bosma](https://sourceforge.net/u/merijnb/)
3. John Huang (@john-huang)

### Video

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/YHKFdfbcP8U" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

### Articles

* [Profiling your concrete5 site with Xdebug and WinCacheGrind](http://www.concrete5.org/documentation/how-tos/developers/profiling-your-concrete5-site-with-xdebug-and-wincachegrind/)
* [Quick Tip: Profiling PHP Applications with Xdebug, WinCacheGrind & XAMPP for Windows](http://www.warpconduit.net/2012/09/01/quick-tip-profiling-php-applications-with-xdebug-wincachegrind-xampp-for-windows/)
* [XDebug + Wincachegrind on Windows](https://www.drupal.org/node/549700)
* [Profiling PHP with Xdebug and WinCacheGrind](http://hosaka.blogspot.com/2006/12/profiling-php-with-xdebug-and.html)
* [What are the column names in WinCacheGrind?](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10091779/what-are-the-column-names-in-wincachegrind)

### Disclaimer
Hendy Irawan, the original developer, no longer maintains this software. Feel free to [fork WinCacheGrind sources from GitHub](https://github.com/ceefour/wincachegrind) and contribute pull requests.
